93015-93016 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = 805 | blank_name = FIPS code | blank_info = | blank1_name = GNIS feature IDs | blank1_info = , | website = }} Fillmore is a small city in Ventura County, California, United States in the Santa Clara River Valley. The population was 16,419 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Ventura County, California
